subTitle: I build things for web
extraInfo: I've spent years perfecting the art of building scalable web applications that just work. As a seasoned Backend Tech Lead at Productbox, I thrive in fast-paced startups where collaboration and creativity are key. I'm passionate about harnessing the power of serverless, AWS, Node.js, and microservices to drive innovation and deliver high-quality projects. And when it comes to monitoring and observability, I'm a firm believer in the importance of tools like Grafana and Prometheus - they're essential for ensuring seamless performance and reliability. But enough about tech (for now!). When I'm not geeking behind the keyboard, you can find me lacing up my hiking boots , plotting my next chess move , or binge-watching Game of Thrones (don't judge!). With a strong foundation in computer science and a drive to stay ahead of the curve, I'm excited to bring my skills to forward-thinking projects in Europe or North America. Let's build something amazing together!
